content: **need a new go-to blanket in your pattern stash ** the hydrangea baby blanket is the perfect choice this blanket is beginner-friendly and works up quickly use the hydrangea-inspired shades shown or grab some yarn from your stash to build your own pretty palette **pattern highlights** // video instructions // make it all in one color or use an array of colors // instructions provided to make this blanket any size you want **suggested yarn** any worsted weight yarn **hooks used** j 10/6mm crochet hook
